provider.name: Oyster (UK)
provider.description:
Shows balance for Oyster (Transpor for London) transport cards (https://oyster.tfl.gov.uk/)

Obtains information from personal account https://oyster.tfl.gov.uk/oyster/entry.do
provider.instruction: If you don't have an account, create it here: https://oyster.tfl.gov.uk/oyster/link/0004.do
provider.author: AnyBalance Team <info@anybalance.ru>
